title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: April 17, 2023, 03:06:26 AMLast edit: August 15, 2023, 06:52:22 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: I have for sale 8 individual Alpencoin DIY coins - I generated and assembled the address & key pairs. The coins do have the first bits printed onto their holograms.Each will come in a black ringed airtite Each is loaded with .001 BTCFunding txn id: https://mempool.space/tx/05af94bad2f120b8f70e5289e2df1984ccfab4ec44ca7639fab9f9c52127dfb1cost is .002 BTC per coin (funding is included in this cost)payment method accepted: BTCpayment address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esshipping is free within the US or free if sent to minerjonesinternational shipping will depend on location.Please confirm if any remain available before sending funds - I will go by the time date stamp of all requests if posted here in the thread for the order in which they will be sold. If you DM me instead of posting here, you are at the mercy of the ones who post here. Unless I am asleep (which is rare lol) I will respond usually pretty quickly. 8 remaining6 remaining4 remaining1 remainingall soldBullion-n-BTC - 2 - paid.kryptowerks - 2 - paid.montreal1 - 2 - paidAmax16 - 1 - paid.MrMojoRising26  -

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: as a note: after posting I see in the images that some of the first bits are hard to read - let me state, they are clear on the coins, that is simply the lighting.
